CustomField.formula: IF(( Total_Regular_Working_Time_In_Mins__c + Total_Extended_Working_Time_In_Mins__c - Total_Non_Working_Time_In_Mins_Before__c ) = 0, 0, ( Scheduled_Task_Duration_Before__c) / (Total_Regular_Working_Time_In_Mins__c + Total_Extended_Working_Time_In_Mins__c - Total_Non_Working_Time_In_Mins_Before__c ))
CustomField.label: Utilization Excl Travel Before
